channel.title: Digital Garden
channel.description: A simple web app for growing knowledge

item.title: Compreension et Pardon
item.description: Réflexion sur la phrase "Tout comprendre, c'est tout pardonner" et l'importance du pardon même sans compréhension complète.---
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Understanding and Forgiveness
item.description: Reflecting on the phrase "To understand all is to forgive all" and the importance of forgiveness even without full understanding.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Promise all() vs allSettled()
item.description: A comparative overview of `Promise.all()` and `Promise.allSettled()`, highlighting their use cases in handling multiple promises in JavaScript asynchronous operations.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: React Lifecycle Hooks
item.description: Ein prägnanter Leitfaden für den Übergang von React-Klassenkomponenten-Lebenszyklusmethoden zu äquivalenten funktionalen Komponenten-Hooks, mit Schwerpunkt auf den Initialisierungs-, Update- und Aufräumphasen.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Hooks de Ciclo de Vida do React
item.description: Um guia conciso para a transição dos métodos de ciclo de vida de componentes de classe do React para hooks de componentes funcionais equivalentes, focando nas fases de inicialização, atualização e limpeza.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Cycle de vie des Hooks React
item.description: Un guide concis pour passer des méthodes du cycle de vie des composants de classe React aux hooks équivalents des composants fonctionnels, en se concentrant sur les phases d'initialisation, de mise à jour et de nettoyage.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: React Lifecycle Hooks
item.description: A concise guide to transitioning from React class component lifecycle methods to equivalent functional component hooks, focusing on initialization, update, and cleanup phases.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Optimierung
item.description: Ein Überblick über das Profiler-Tag von React zur Leistungsoptimierung, das Einblicke in die Rendierungszeiten von Komponenten bietet und hilft, Engpässe zu identifizieren.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Otimização
item.description: Uma visão geral da tag Profiler do React para otimização de desempenho, fornecendo insights sobre os tempos de renderização de componentes e ajudando a identificar gargalos.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Optimisation
item.description: Un aperçu de la balise Profiler de React pour l'optimisation des performances, offrant des informations sur les temps de rendu des composants et aidant à identifier les goulots d'étranglement.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Optimization
item.description: An overview of React's Profiler tag for performance optimization, providing insights into component rendering times and helping identify bottlenecks.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: HTTPS
item.description: HTTPS encrypts web communications, protecting against intrusions and enabling advanced features like service workers for Progressive Web Apps (PWAs). Essential for security and modern web functionalities, HTTPS is a fundamental requirement for any secure and innovative website.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Risiko
item.description: Erkundung des nuancierten Verständnisses von Risiko bei Investitionen, wie es von Carl Richards formuliert wurde: das Unerwartete, das nach umfassender Planung bleibt.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Risco
item.description: Explorando o entendimento sutil do risco em investimentos conforme articulado por Carl Richards: o imprevisto que permanece após um planejamento exaustivo.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Risque
item.description: Exploration de la compréhension nuancée du risque en investissement telle qu'articulée par Carl Richards : l'imprévu qui reste après une planification exhaustive.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Risk
item.description: Exploring the nuanced understanding of risk in investment as articulated by Carl Richards: the unforeseen that remains after exhaustive planning.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Failure Journal
item.description: Embrace failure as a stepping stone to growth with a Failure Journal—record each setback, reflect on lessons learned after 2 months, and recognize positive outcomes after 6 months.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Create Function Component
item.description: A quick guide on utilizing the 'rfce' shortcut to efficiently generate a React functional component, streamlining the development process.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: How We See Things
item.description: An small insight that our perception of reality is shaped more by our internal states and biases than by the objective nature of things.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: E2E Time to Live
item.description: Exploring the role of Time to Live (TTL) in End-to-End (E2E) testing, focusing on its importance in maintaining the validity and cleanliness of test environments, data, and states.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Long Letter Quote by Mark Twain
item.description: Mark Twain's quote, "Sorry I wrote a long letter, I didn't have time to write a short one," highlights the challenge of brevity. Simplifying content to its essence requires deep understanding and effort, underlining the value of concise communication.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: die Essenz des Lebens
item.description: Eine Reflexion über die Idee, dass die Essenz des Lebens nicht gefunden, sondern durch die Zuweisung von Bedeutung zu jedem Moment geschaffen wird.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: O sentido da vida
item.description: Uma reflexão sobre a ideia de que a essência do propósito da vida não está em ser encontrada, mas sim em ser criada pela atribuição de significado a cada momento.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: L'essence de la vie
item.description: Une réflexion sur l'idée que l'essence de la vie ne se trouve pas mais se crée en attribuant un sens à chaque moment.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: The Sense of Life
item.description: A reflection on the idea that the essence of life is not to be found but to be created by assigning meaning to every moment.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Happiness Perception
item.description: Exploring the concept of happiness as a continuous journey, this text examines the philosophical notion that happiness must be unbroken to be valid, challenging us to rethink how we perceive contentment.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Love by Spinoza
item.description: Spinoza defines love as "joy accompanied by the idea of its cause," prompting reflection on what drives passion in projects. Identifying the root of joy in work can lead to more fulfilling endeavors, aligning with Spinoza's philosophical view on love and its causes.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Is High-Quality Software Worth the Cost?
item.description: High-quality software, while not immediately visible to customers, offers long-term benefits such as lower maintenance costs, improved user satisfaction, and competitive advantage. These advantages justify the initial investment, underscoring the value of prioritizing internal quality in software development.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Typ ohne Zuordnung zurückgeben
item.description: Demonstrates a TypeScript strategy for sorting an array of users by a formatted name without remapping the entity or altering the original user type, utilizing advanced type capabilities for efficient data handling.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Retornar um Tipo Sem Mapping
item.description: Demonstra uma estratégia TypeScript para ordenar uma matriz de usuários por um nome formatado sem remapear a entidade ou alterar o tipo de usuário original, utilizando capacidades avançadas de tipo para manipulação eficiente de dados.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Retourner un Type Sans Mapping
item.description: Démontre une stratégie TypeScript pour trier un tableau d'utilisateurs par un nom formaté sans remappage de l'entité ou altération du type utilisateur d'origine, en utilisant les capacités de type avancées pour une manipulation efficace des données.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Edit Text in Browser Console
item.description: A quick guide on enabling text editing within any webpage using a simple JavaScript command in the browser console, offering a convenient way for developers to experiment with content changes.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Git Workflow
item.description: Explore advanced Git commands to refine your workflow, including amending commits, using fixup for PR reviews, rebasing with autosquash, and safely updating remote references using --force-with-lease.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Return a Type Without Mapping
item.description: Demonstrates a TypeScript strategy for sorting an array of users by a formatted name without remapping the entity or altering the original user type, utilizing advanced type capabilities for efficient data handling.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Memoisierung
item.description: Das Verständnis von Reacts Memoisierungsansatz mit memo(), useMemo und useCallback sowie Richtlinien für deren optimale Verwendung zur Verbesserung der Leistung durch Vermeidung unnötiger Neu-Renderings.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Memoização
item.description: Compreendendo a abordagem de memoização do React com memo(), useMemo e useCallback, e diretrizes sobre seu uso ideal para aprimorar o desempenho evitando renderizações desnecessárias.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Mémoïsation
item.description: Comprendre l'approche de mémoïsation de React avec `memo()`, `useMemo` et `useCallback`, et des directives sur leur utilisation optimale pour améliorer les performances en évitant les nouveaux rendus inutiles.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: Memoization
item.description: Understanding React's memoization approach with `memo()`, `useMemo`, and `useCallback`, and guidelines on their optimal usage to enhance performance by preventing unnecessary re-renders.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)

item.title: 5 superpowers in investments
item.description: Unveil the five critical investment superpowers: managing FOMO, understanding your investment game, adopting a long-term horizon, distinguishing patience from stubbornness, and embracing discomfort for success.
item.author: idcangussu+tree@hotmail.com (Igor Cangussu)
